data.text: @EthicalSkeptic Pretty sure I read this already but just to be sure you have factored out suicides, correct?
@EthicalSkeptic Can't take away a people's sense of purpose and meaning in life and not have severe consequences
@AmericanGidget Me too. I do have inductive allocations in my model as to age brackets. The highest rising age bracket is 40-44 years in age. https://t.co/0hUWpNqHmg
